snippet.title: Stellaris: Apocalypse - Feature Breakdown
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Now: http://pdxint.at/2C1smFB
Daniel Moregård, Game Designer of the PDS Stellaris Team takes us through the upcoming changes both for the expansion Apocalypse as well as the free Update of patch 2.0.

Stellaris: Apocalypse adds an encroaching swarm of new offensive and defensive options,
alongside several nonviolent features. Several free features will also be added to Stellaris when
Apocalypse launches, giving all players more tools and methods to stave off doom. The new
expansion and free update will both arrive on all platforms on February 22.
